channel.title: Rscd players online ain't updating
channel.description:
So, I'm logged in with my character, but on the website, it says 0 players online. AND: server is offline, when it clearly is not.
Edit; I figured it out myself why there reads "offline" when its online.......... :rolleyes:
But still trying to figure out, why doesn't the login server change the player's "loggedin" status to 1 when somebody logs in...

item.title: Rscd players online ain't updating
item.dc:creator: @Vicd Vicd
item.description:
@Vicd wrote:

Yeah I know.

I got it fixed, thanks for your help

Read full topic

You can’t always depend on RSCA.
They do have it although, I think it is “online”

item.title: Rscd players online ain't updating
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“Vicd, post:3, topic:375569”][quote author=adu link=topic=471507.msg3449322#msg3449322 date=1293637752]

But still trying to figure out, why doesn’t the login server change the player’s “loggedin” status to 1 when somebody logs in…

You just answered your own question.
[/quote]So its not supposed to work without fixing it first?
Which is the right file to look, in purpose to fix it?[/quote]

Its the file in the login server where it register’s the player. Simply add a sql query that changes your table value.

Read full topic
